Class CourseCatalog

java.lang.Object
problem1.CourseCatalog
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICourseCatalog
public class CourseCatalog extends Object implements ICourseCatalog
This is a CourseCatalog class. Represent a CourseCatalog with Courses and number of courses
